mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (toWho, fromWho, toUserType, fromUserType, title, content) VALUES (#{toWho}, #{fromWho}, #{toUserType}, #{fromUserType}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT messageNo, toWho, fromWho, toUserType, fromUserType, title, content, isRead, regDate FROM message ORDER BY regDate DESC
SELECT messageNo, toWho, fromWho, toUserType, fromUserType, title, content, isRead, regDate FROM message WHERE toWho = #{toWho} AND toUserType = #{toUserType} ORDER BY regDate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET isRead = #{isRead} WHERE isRead = 'N'
